com.ansca.corona.permissions

Class PermissionsSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ansca.corona.permissions.PermissionsSettings

  • public class PermissionsSettings
extends Object
    Stores Permissions configuration options such as which permissions to request, why they're needed, how important they are to the app, etc.

    Added in daily build 2016.2828.

      • from

        public static PermissionsSettings from(HashMap<String,Object> collection)
        Extracts the PermissionsSettings from a Corona Hashtable.
        Parameters:
        collection - The HashMap to extract PermissionsSettings from.
        Returns:
        Returns a new PermissionsSettings object containing the information stored in the given hashtable. If the given table is invalid, then the returned object will be set to its defaults.
